p: Previous studies reported that CHLA and CHLI exhibit broad-spectrum antiviral activities by targeting viral glycoproteinâ€“glycosaminoglycan interactions ( Lin et al., 2011, 2013; Kesharwani et al., 2017). However, our data demonstrated that CHLA and CHLI do not interfere with influenza virus entry or RNA replication, but act as NA inhibitors targeting virus release.
